data.title: Lietuvos SSR Valstybės Saugumo Komitetas Selected Records
data.text:
Lietuvos Ssr Valstybės Saugumo Komitetas Selected Records [english Finding Aid]

Fond K-1, Lietuvos SSR Valstybės Saugumo Komitetas records

Opis 2, Counterintelligence Department of the NKVD-MGB-KGB of the LSSR records, 1941–55 (8 reels)

REGISTER (PDF, 174 KB)

Fond K-16, Inspectorate under the chair of the committee of state security (KGB) of the Lithuanian SSR records

Opis 1, Files relating to the activities [of the inspectorate], 1946–58 (12 reels)

REGISTER (PDF, 143 KB)

REGISTER (PDF, 124 KB)

REGISTER (PDF, 1638 KB)

REGISTER (PDF, 73 KB)

Opis 1, Files relating to the activities [of the republican commission], 1949–53 (26 reels)
